name: Evan You (尤雨溪)
bio: Evan You is a software developer best known as the creator of Vue.js, a progressive JavaScript framework. Former Google engineer who worked on AngularJS before developing Vue in 2014.
education: Studied Art & Design at Colgate University before transitioning to software development.

posts.title: Vue 3.0 Released
posts.content: The new version of Vue.js comes with the Composition API, better TypeScript support, and improved performance.

posts.title: Introducing Vite
posts.content: Vite is a new frontend build tool that significantly improves the development experience for modern web projects.

name: Ben Hong
bio: Ben Hong is a Vue.js core team member and senior frontend engineer passionate about developer experience and open source education.
education: Computer Science degree from University of California, Berkeley

posts.title: Vue 3 Composition API Best Practices
posts.content: Exploring patterns and anti-patterns when using the Composition API in Vue 3 applications.

posts.title: Demystifying Vue's Reactivity System
posts.content: A deep dive into how Vue's reactivity system works under the hood.

posts.title: Getting Started with Vue Testing
posts.content: Practical guide to testing Vue components with Jest and Testing Library.
